value:
Midgard is so full of people...
I'm happy to have this opportunity
to meet them all.

Seiðr and I were raised together
like sisters—and we look so similar,
you'd be surprised to learn we're not!

Is there something unusual about
my outfit here in this world?

You must not lie to a goddess.
So, tell me the truth... What do
you think of Seið?

They say goddesses are born in light.
I can't say I have any memories from
when I came to be, myself...

I am Heiðr, goddess of Vanaheimr.
Would you...be willing to show me
around this castle of yours?

Do you think I'll grow to be as strong
as Seiðr if I continue on like this?

Don't worry over me. I am still a
goddess of Vanaheimr, after all.

I hope you can forgive this...
I'm rather embarrassed.

Thank you, but... I hope you didn't
forget to give Seiðr a gift as well.
I don't want her to feel left out...

Y-you summoned...me? I hope
Seiðr doesn't get the wrong idea,
with you being her destined and all...

Goddesses can create children
of their own... Did you know that,
$Nu?$k$pLike you, I have a mother... I know
she exists, somewhere. I exist, so
I know she created me.$k$pOf course, that doesn't change the
fact that I don't know her.$k$pEven so, knowing she's out there
is like a light in the darkness—even
if I never am able to meet her.$k$pThis curse is sure to be the end
of me soon. I can feel how little
time I have left...$k$pI'm still grateful for what time
I was given.
I will do as Seið would!
Will of the gods!
Revealing light!
We must battle.
It's not your fault, Seið...
I'm Heiðr. I know I may not look the part, but I am a goddess of Vanaheimr.
Ah— But your destiny lies with my sister!
So then, this is Seiðr's destined... How exciting!
A goddess who gives the gift of revelation will be wholly bound to their destined... That's no small matter!
Seiðr is so kind... She has always been like a sister to me.
I'm sorry, Seið... I would never wish this on you...
I hope you show Seiðr the kindness she deserves... Oh, should I say please?
I have no doubt.
What can I do?
A goddess abides.
